What is Testing?

Software Errors

  • Functional errors
  • Performance errors

  • Metadata errors
  • Error-handling errors
  • User interface errors
  • API usage errors
  • â€¦

  • Program, device ë˜ëŠ” systemì— malformed (ë¹„ì •ìƒ) ë° unexpected input dataë¥¼ feedí•˜ì—¬ security ê´€ë ¨ defect ë˜ëŠ” denial of service, degradation of service ë˜ëŠ” ê¸°íƒ€ ì›ì¹˜ ì•ŠëŠ” behaviorë¡œ ì´ì–´ì§€ëŠ” critical flawë¥¼ ì°¾ëŠ” negative software testing ë°©ë²• (A. Takanen et al, 2008)

Types of Faulty Found

  • Pointer/array errors
  • Not checking return codes

  • Data corruption
  • Signed characters
  • Race conditions
  • Undocumented features
  • ...Possible tradeoffs?
